website_summaries.verdict: Ladies have a lot to love about the Siren Strap Q2 from Merrell. Its has posh looks and is amazingly light, comfortable, and versatile. On top of all that, its fit is nothing short of exemplary. It is not at all bright and sunny, however, as its problematic straps and depressing lack of arch support smear its brilliance. Overall, the Siren Strap Q2 makes for a captivating product, thanks to its defining qualities that go beyond aesthetics. A bit of compromise concerning its slipups, however, is necessary.
pros: Quite a number of loyal Merrell supporters had their expectations exceeded by the Siren Strap Q2’s enchanting level of comfort
Many of those who bought this strappy hiking gear couldn’t help but describe it as an insatiably cute sandal
Dozens of wearers found a perfect fit in this Merrell footwear
This sandal, based on numerous reports, is as useful for hiking as it is for virtually everything else
The Siren Strap Q2 enamored a moderate percentage of owners with its excessive lightness
Some wearers considered the sandal’s break-in period nonexistent
With this sandal on, users by the handful didn’t dread losing grip over challenging terrain
According to a couple of buyers, the Merrell Siren Strap Q2 is undeniably a worthy purchase
cons: A considerable number of owners with wider ankle girth expressed their dismay concerning the sandal’s ankle strap
They said that it could use a bit more length so that they could strap it in more securely
The Siren Strap Q2 didn’t win the favor of a select few for lacking arch support
Based on a couple of reviews, the sandal’s diagonal (instep) strap becomes too tight, especially once the feet start to swell
A tiny fraction of verified buyers detested the footbed’s toe bar—the ridge right below where the toes flex

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Merrell sandals for some years, so bought these with high expectations. The fit is good (I have fairly narrow feet) and they are pretty comfortable. However I much prefer the soft microfibre footbed of the Terran to this "Textured EVA Integrated footbed" which feels a bit rubbery and faintly sticky.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Comfy..but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I actually was close to sticking with these shoes as they are quite comfortable. But I swapped em for something much better looking to me lol. Also... I deduced that over time, the strap going over my little time would really start to aggravate me. So on that basis I sent them back and bought a different pair of Merrells. Also the velcro fastenings are a little short.. I forsee loosening if I'd bought these.
customer_reviews.author: victoria banks

customer_reviews.title: Gre as t looking, comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal and waterproof too so I wear in the sea. Pinched across the cross strap for 3 days where the plastic buckle is but when the le as ther softened it's perfect now and I wear them all day
customer_reviews.author: C. Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but colour not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Returned them, disappointed with colour, sort of violet shade of blue. Description velvet morning not much help...
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were bought to replace a previous pair of Merrill sandals, would have liked a deeper sole but these were as comfortable and supportive as previous.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Grant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Returning the shoes as they are no good for wide feet combined with a high instep
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very light on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I have taking up rambling for health that is why I bought them. It’s like walking on air very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ann hornby

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable design would have torn my feet to shreds if had used for walking. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Maevis

customer_reviews.title: Great sports sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great sports sandals. Super fit. My feet feel supported and I have already worn them in a variety of terrains. Competitively priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant elegant walking sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals because they are comfortable and also look very nice. A bit more elegant looking than most hiking sandals. I have size 5.5 feet and the size 5s fit me, but not much room to spare. So I think they would also be right for size 5. They are possibly on the narrow side, but the straps are adjustable and they hold the foot really well in place on the footbed. The colour is a dusky dark red. Pinkish rather than brownish red, but very muted. Works really well with the black.
customer_reviews.author: Rabscuttlerun

customer_reviews.title: A more feminine option....
customer_reviews.text: As far as walking sandals go, this is the most feminine ones by far. Flip flops are made for walking, so I had to succumb to getting sandals. They were all really big and unflattering, so when i saw these, I knew I’ve hit a middle ground. Not too big, but still the necessary straps ect in place to make them practical for moderate walking. I will be testing them soon when we go on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Maritha

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The style is not workable. The ankle strap is too small. Believe me I have thin ankles but yet the strap was too short. Sending them back as not comfortable to wear The sole in plastic started to make my feet feel hot. Not nice. Plus side. They are very light to wear but not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: comfort all day
customer_reviews.text: I love Merrell sandals and these Siren straps are so comfortable, with a soft insole and expandable straps. I'm on my feet and walking all day and I have no aches wearing these beauties.
customer_reviews.author: Jill wallace

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable. No breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lightweight sandals. Adjustable around ankle and across foot. Extremely comfortable. No breaking in necessary
customer_reviews.author: Southfeild

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Siren Strap Q2 Sports & Outdoor Sandals
product_meta.description: Designed for wild and women. This comfortable sandal is engineered for the way women move, offering support, alignment, and gender-specific stability.
feature_bullets: Waterproof Nubuck And Webbing Upper - Provides the wearer with protection, comfort and resistant to water.
Lycra Neoprene Lining - Increases padding and acts as a support to the feet.
Q Form 2 Dual-Density Midsole - Provides gender-engineered alignment and comfort.
Compression Moulded EVA Foot Frame - Cushioning and absorbs shock with air cushioning.
EVA Footbed - Adjusts to the shape of your foot to provide a nice, snug fit.
